ramen.name: Nongshim Shin Original
ramen.description: A generous portion of thick chewy noodles paired with a bold comforting broth that features a rich, umami taste with layers of beefy warmth, aromatic garlic, sweet onion, as well as subtle hints of mushroom and soy sauce.
ramen.allergen: Please refer to each product’s packaging for detailed allergen information.
ramen.suggested_toppings:
Protein: Hard-boiled egg or Korean smokies
Veggie: Bok choy or corn
Hack ingredient (optional): Mayonnaise or sesame paste
FREE garnishes (optional): Green onion, jalapenos, red radish, cilantro

ramen.name: Nongshim Shin Black
ramen.description: Similar to the classic Shin Original, but with a creamier broth that draws extra richness from premium beef bone stock, enhanced garlic, and an added kick from black garlic oil for a smoother, more luxurious finish.

ramen.name: Buldak Carbonara
ramen.description: A creamy twist on Buldak's original fire noodles, this stir-fry ramen combines chewy noodles with a velvety sauce that blends bold Korean heat with smooth, cheesy creaminess. ramen.name: Nissin Raoh Tonkotsu
ramen.description: Nissin Raoh Tonkotsu brings this beloved ramen flavor one notch up by delivering a deeply rich, creamy pork bone broth that’s smooth and full-bodied without being heavy.  Its firm, straight noodles resemble fresh ramen, creating a sophisticated restaurant-style bowl that feels luxurious yet approachable.  Perfect for those with a more refined palate seeking extra depth and truer tonkotsu richness.

ramen.name: Sapporo Ichiban Tonkotsu
ramen.description: A more approachable take on classic tonkotsu, Sapporo Ichiban’s version features a balanced, mildly creamy pork broth that’s lighter and subtly sweet, making it easy to enjoy for all palates. The familiar curly noodles soak up the savory broth beautifully, offering an affordable choice that still feels satisfying and special.

ramen.name: Sapporo Ichiban Miso
ramen.description: An inviting bowl of springy noodles served in a delicate miso broth made from a blend of six different miso varieties and mixed vegetables. This classic Japanese ramen offers a smooth, mellow umami depth that clearly distincts itself from the bold, fiery taste of Korean ramyun.  Yet the seven-spice chili seasoning does deliver a gentle kick that ties all the flavors beautifully together.

ramen.name: Sapporo Ichiban Chicken
ramen.description: A light, comforting noodle soup with a clean, savory chicken broth that impresses especially at the entry level. Less spicy and more delicate than Korean ramyun, it offers a smooth, mellow taste that feels both cozy and satisfying — a standout among Japanese instant ramen that's also great as a versatile hack base.

ramen.description: Hugely popular in the soy sauce noodles category, this option features A-Sha's famous air-dried wheat flour noodles with a superior chewy texture that stands out even more in this wide cut format.  It's drenched in a refined soy sauce seasoning that highlights subtle umami rather than overpowering the palate, letting the noodz shine as the true star.

ramen.name: A-Sha Tainan Style with Sesame Paste Sauce
ramen.description: These Tainan-style wheat noodles — with their distinct thinner, wavier shape — still deliver A-Sha’s signature air-dried chew and bouncy bite. Paired with a creamy, nutty sesame paste sauce that’s smooth and rich (but not overly heavy), this bowl strikes the perfect balance between comfort and boldness.

ramen.description: These Hakka-style wide noodles showcase A-Sha’s iconic air-dried chewy texture, with extra surface area that enhances their satisfying bounce. ramen.name: Indomie Original
ramen.description: A beloved Indonesian street food that has earned its place as the world's best selling instant noodle, Indomie delights global tastebuds with its lightly chewy noodles coated in an addictive sweet-savory sauce made from five flavorful seasoning sachets.  Enjoy its compact size as a quick snack, or double up for a satisfying meal.

ramen.name: Mana Shrimp Tom Yum
ramen.description: A go-to choice from Thailand, Mama Shrimp Creamy Tom Yum noodle offers that unmistakable spicy-sour kick, balanced with a rich, creamy finish that makes every slurp irresistible.  The springy noodles soak up a fragrant broth layered with lemongrass, lime, and chili, while a subtle shrimp note ties it all together. ramen.name: Prima Taste Singapore Curry
ramen.description: Considered a gold standard of instant noodles, Prima Taste Laksa LaMian transforms an everyday meal into a luxurious treat.  Thick, springy air-dried noodles deliver a gourmet bite that rivals fresh ramen shops, while the rich, creamy curry broth explodes with real coconut milk, aromatic spices, and deep seafood umami.  Yes, this Singaporean laksa is a premium choice — but social media fans agree: once you taste it, you’ll understand why it’s worth every slurp.
